channel.title: Thread-4
channel.description:
After logging out of my server and back in, it gives me this error and will not log me in:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.method79(client.java:5585) at client.method84(client.java:5889) at client.method140(client.java:10224) at client.method7(client.java:1855) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:115) at client.run(client.java:4254) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) [/code]
Any help?

item.title: Thread-4
